SEARCH
Module iu.util.logging.impl
Package iu.logging

Class Bootstrap

java.lang.Object
iu.logging.Bootstrap
public final class Bootstrap extends Object
Logging implementation bootstrap.

To be invoked externally by a module that controls the logging implementation ModuleLayer.Controller, typically by a class provided via the -Djava.util.logging.config.class JVM argument. Invoke configure(boolean) first, then initializeContext(String, boolean, String, String, String, String, String, String) for each class loader prior to using follow(Object, String, Object) within its context.

  • Method Details

    • configure

      public static boolean configure(boolean update)
      Reads the logging configuration from iu.config/logging.properties.
      Parameters:
      update - True to update the existing configuration; false for initial system configuration.
      Returns:
      true if logging configuration exists and was updated
      See Also:
      • LogManager.readConfiguration(java.io.InputStream)

    • initialize

      public static void initialize()
      Ensures that logging is fully initialized for the system and platform ClassLoaders.

      Runtime properties:

      • iu.development - development environment flag
      • iu.endpoint - refers to the external port or client node identifier for the active runtime
      • iu.application - refers to the application configuration code relative to the runtime environment
      • iu.environment - refers to the application's environment code, for classifying runtime configuration
      • iu.module - refers to the module configuration code, relative to application and environment
      • iu.runtime - refers to the runtime configuration code, relative to application and environment
      • iu.component - refers to the component name, relative to application, environment, and runtime
      See Also:
      • initializeContext(String, boolean, String, String, String, String, String, String)

    • initializeContext

      public static void initializeContext(String nodeId, boolean development, String endpoint, String application, String environment, String module, String runtime, String component)
      Initializes attributes for the current thread's context.
      Parameters:
      nodeId - runtime node identifier; defaults to InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostName()
      development - development environment flag
      endpoint - external port or client node identifier
      application - application configuration code
      environment - environment code
      module - module configuration code, relative to application and environment
      runtime - runtime configuration code, relative to application and environment
      component - component name, relative to application, environment, and runtime
      See Also:
      • initialize()

    • getEnvironment

      public static LogEnvironment getEnvironment()
      Gets the initialized LogEnvironment for the current context ClassLoader.
      Returns:
      LogEnvironment

    • getActiveContext

      public static <T> T getActiveContext(Class<T> contextType)
      Gets the active context on the current thread.
      Type Parameters:
      T - context type
      Parameters:
      contextType - context type
      Returns:
      log context

    • follow

      public static Object follow(Object context, String header, Object supplier) throws Throwable
      Proxy method for ProcessLogger.follow(LogContext, String, UnsafeSupplier).
      Parameters:
      context - externally defined LogContext
      header - process log header message
      supplier - externally defined UnsafeSupplier
      Returns:
      return value
      Throws:
      Throwable - if an error occurs
